prerequisites.title: Requirements not met
prerequisites.socialRequired: You need to connect at least one social network or import at least 5 posts to activate the marketing autopilot.
prerequisites.salesRequired: You need at least one deal or contact in the CRM to activate the sales autopilot.
prerequisites.financeRequired: You need at least some platform activity (agent executions or health snapshots) to activate the finance autopilot.
prerequisites.legalRequired: You need to configure at least one legal parameter to activate the legal autopilot.
prerequisites.hrRequired: You need at least 2 team members registered to activate the HR autopilot.
prerequisites.operationsRequired: You need at least 1 AI workforce team configured to activate the operations autopilot.
prerequisites.salesBootstrapHint: Create a deal or import contacts so the Sales Autopilot can analyze your pipeline.
prerequisites.financeBootstrapHint: Run any platform agent to generate activity the Finance Autopilot can monitor.
prerequisites.hrBootstrapHint: Invite at least 2 members to your team from Settings > Team.
prerequisites.legalBootstrapHint: Go to Business DNA and configure at least one parameter with 'legal_' prefix.
prerequisites.operationsBootstrapHint: Create an AI workforce team from the Operations panel.

execDiagnosis.ctaTitle: Ready to Build Your Strategic DNA
execDiagnosis.ctaDescription: The Enterprise Brain will now guide you through defining your mission, vision, value proposition, and competitive strategy based on the insights above.
execDiagnosis.ctaNextStepSub: Define your mission, vision, and value proposition with AI assistance.
execDiagnosis.revenueAtRiskDesc: Conservative estimation of business impact from identified digital gaps.
execDiagnosis.leadGenImpactDesc: Potential leads lost due to lack of accessibility and discoverability in digital channels.
execDiagnosis.missedOpportunitiesDesc: Business opportunities lost due to absence of verifiable case studies, testimonials, or portfolio.
execDiagnosis.dueDiligenceRiskDesc: Risk in formal evaluation processes due to lack of structured public information.
execDiagnosis.scenarioWith: Structured digital presence with case studies, testimonials, public metrics, and accessible contact information generates trust and reduces friction in decision-making.
execDiagnosis.scenarioWithout: Absence of verifiable assets forces prospects to rely solely on referrals, significantly limiting scalability and increasing customer acquisition cost.
execDiagnosis.sdiInterpretation_emerging: Your digital presence has significant gaps that limit discoverability and trust. Prospects evaluating your company will find insufficient evidence to support a decision, increasing reliance on personal referrals.
execDiagnosis.sdiInterpretation_building: Your digital foundation exists but lacks key trust signals. You have basic visibility but critical verification assets (case studies, testimonials, structured data) are missing or incomplete.
execDiagnosis.sdiInterpretation_competitive: Your digital presence is functional and supports most business processes. Optimization of trust signals and content strategy will accelerate lead conversion and reduce acquisition costs.
execDiagnosis.sdiInterpretation_reference: Your digital ecosystem is robust, well-structured, and trust-generating. You operate at a level comparable to market leaders, with verifiable assets that facilitate decision-making at scale.
execDiagnosis.sdiBenchmark_emerging: Typical of early-stage businesses or companies that have relied exclusively on offline channels and personal networks.
execDiagnosis.sdiBenchmark_building: Common in SMBs with 1‚Äì3 years of digital activity that haven't yet systematized their online credibility.
execDiagnosis.sdiBenchmark_competitive: Characteristic of established businesses with dedicated marketing efforts and structured digital operations.
execDiagnosis.sdiBenchmark_reference: Typical of market leaders and digitally mature organizations with comprehensive online strategies.
execDiagnosis.archetypeDesc_micro_early: You operate at an early-stage level with minimal structured digital evidence. Your competitive advantage relies on personal networks and word-of-mouth rather than demonstrable authority.
execDiagnosis.archetypeDesc_boutique_specialized: You have niche positioning but lack the trust infrastructure to compete beyond your immediate network. Your specialization is an asset, but it's not yet digitally validated.
execDiagnosis.archetypeDesc_structured_firm: Your digital presence supports business operations effectively. You compete on substance but could strengthen your authority signals to win against larger players.
execDiagnosis.archetypeDesc_market_leader: Your digital ecosystem positions you as a reference in your category. You compete on authority, evidence, and structured trust.
execDiagnosis.toCompeteNext: What You Need to Compete at the Next Level
archetypeUpgrade_micro_early: Establish verifiable case studies with measurable outcomes
Create structured service pages with clear methodology
Build a testimonial system with named clients and roles
Implement basic SEO with targeted industry keywords
archetypeUpgrade_boutique_specialized: Develop a portfolio of documented success stories with metrics
Obtain third-party validations (certifications, awards, media mentions)
Systematize your client acquisition beyond referrals
archetypeUpgrade_structured_firm: Scale content production with authority-building assets
Invest in competitive intelligence and market positioning
Build automated trust signals (real-time metrics, client dashboards)
Establish strategic partnerships and ecosystem presence
execDiagnosis.archetypeClosing_micro_early: Currently competing on narrative. To compete on authority, you need structured evidence.
execDiagnosis.archetypeClosing_boutique_specialized: Currently competing on specialization. To compete on trust, you need verifiable proof at scale.
execDiagnosis.archetypeClosing_structured_firm: Currently competing on substance. To compete on category leadership, you need ecosystem dominance.
execDiagnosis.archetypeClosing_market_leader: You compete on authority and evidence. Maintain your edge by continuously innovating your trust infrastructure.
